task.title: PDF
task.shortdesc: The PLOT command is available for exporting the drawing as a PDF file.

context.p: PDF files allow you to distribute your drawing to others for viewing in Adobe速 Acrobat 速 Reader速, which is free software that users can download. PDF files can also be viewed, reviewed, and edited in Adobe速 Acrobat.
To export a drawing to a PDF file

step.cmd: Choose File > Plot from the mainmenu.
Choose DWG To PDF.pc5 for the Name option from the Printer/plotter area on the Plot dialog box.
Specify the location andthe name for the PDF file in Browse for Plot File dialog box.
